Class Backpack

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.item.Backpack
public class Backpack extends Object
Represents the hero's backpack which can hold various items. The backpack has a defined width and height, and items can be placed, removed, moved, and rotated within it. It also tracks the mana provided by the mana stones contained in the backpack.
Author:
Yacine

      Checks if an item can be placed at the specified anchor position in the backpack.

      Returns:

      public Item remove(Position anchor)
      Removes the item at the specified anchor position from the backpack.
      Parameters:
      anchor - the anchor position of the item to be removed
      Returns:

    • getItemAt

      public Optional<Item> getItemAt(Position pos)
      Gets the item located at the specified position in the backpack.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position to check
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the item if found, or an empty Optional if no item is at the position

    • getAnchorAt

      Gets the anchor position of the item located at the specified position in the backpack.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position to check
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the anchor position if found, or an empty Optional if no item is at the position

    • move

      public boolean move(Position fromAnchor, Position toAnchor)
      Moves an item from one anchor position to another within the backpack.
      Parameters:
      fromAnchor - the current anchor position of the item
      toAnchor - the new anchor position where the item should be moved
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully moved, false otherwise

    • rotateItem

      public boolean rotateItem(Position anchor)
      Rotates the item at the specified anchor position by 90 degrees clockwise.
      Parameters:
      anchor - the anchor position of the item to be rotated
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully rotated, false otherwise
